section_title: METHODOLOGICAL AND INSTITUTIONAL ASPECTS OF BEST PRACTICES
sentences: Chair Lowe highlighted the importance of synergies among policies, analytical capacity, multiple factors- including cost effectiveness and perceptions of fairness-and information exchange.
He noted working group participants' interest in market instruments.
He identified the next step as improving data and analytical capacity and more fruitful information sharing between countries.
enb_long_title: UNFCCC WORKSHOP ON BEST PRACTICES IN POLICIES AND MEASURES
